title: HR Management Practical Skills Enhancement: Play-Based Deep Learning Space Design: Experiential Learning for Multidisciplinary

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Social Science Understanding and Teamwork Experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the application of three principles of social interaction to play activities.
Learners can propose two or more personal and social problem-solving strategies through experiential simulation.
Learners can analyze the impact of play experiences on physical, emotional, and moral growth in three dimensions through reflective journaling.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
